selected_quotes: Some of us try to write broadly accessible books about science. Few are interested.
Get a new hobby horse folks, this one's dead
A pub brawl over research funding doesn't benefit any of us (...although I'd back myself in a brawl)
These guys know a thing or 2 about research, communication pubs, As usual they're speaking sense. @rodl @willozap

citation.abstract: Well, here we are again. Lazy swipes by lazy blowhards at lazy academics lazing their way through hyper competitive granting procedures

facebook.title: A pub brawl over research funding doesn't benefit any of us
facebook.summary:
Diversity is part of being human. I think a necessary skill when choosing how public money is spent is respecting that even if I don't personally care about something that some other people might; it's important to have empathy.

'You see, people differ. S

facebook.title: A pub brawl over research funding doesn't benefit any of us
facebook.summary:
Do you remember the saying - two dogs fighting over a bone, the third one runs off with it?  

Seems to be an opportunity for a third dog here...

facebook.title: A pub brawl over research funding doesn't benefit any of us
facebook.summary: It’s all so sadly familiar: lazy swipes by lazy blowhards at lazy academics lazing their way through granting procedures.
